sentences: This issue (FCCC/SB/2012/1) was first considered by the SBI on 14 May.
It was subsequently considered in a joint SBI/SBSTA contact group, co-chaired by Carlos Fuller (Belize) and Zitouni Ould-Dada (United Kingdom).
Parties noted that modalities on linkages with other relevant institutional arrangements under and outside the Convention were too general and called for more specific references to interlinkages.
